mapper.select: select b.no,u.name, b.id, u.img, b.content, b.img1, b.hashtag, b.regdate,b.up from user1 u inner join board1 b on u.id=b.id order by b.no desc

select DISTINCT b.no, u.name, b.id as id, u.img, b.content, b.img1, b.hashtag, b.regdate from board1 b, follows f, user1 u where b.id=f.following_id and u.id=f.id and u.id=#{id} order by b.regdate desc
select b.no, u.name, b.id, b.up, b.prv, u.img, b.content, b.img1, b.img2, b.img3, b.hashtag, b.regdate from user1 u inner join board1 b on u.id=b.id where no=#{no}
mapper.update: update board1 set content=#{content}, hashtag=#{hashtag}, img1=#{img1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img2=#{img2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img3=#{img3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where no=#{no}
